00046 // Precondition:
00047 // Parametre: double Pth_n
00048 // Signification: La pression a l'etape precedente
00049 // Valeurs par defaut:
00050 // Contraintes:
00051 // Acces: entree
00052 // Exception:
00053 // Effets de bord:
00054 // Postcondition:
00055 //
00056 //! Resoud l'EDO
00057 /** \return double<br>
00058 Signification: La nouvelle valeur de la pression<br>
00059 Contraintes: */
00060 double EDO_Pression_th_VEF_Gaz_Reel::resoudre(double Pth_n)
00061 {
00062   int n_bord ;
00063   for (n_bord=0; n_bord<la_zone->nb_front_Cl(); n_bord++)
00064     {
00065       const Cond_lim& la_cl = la_zone_Cl->les_conditions_limites(n_bord);
00066       if (sub_type(Neumann_sortie_libre, la_cl.valeur()))
00067         return Pth_n;
00068     }
00069   double Pth;
00070   const DoubleTab& tab_vit = ref_cast(Navier_Stokes_std,le_fluide_->vitesse()->equation()).vitesse();
00071   const DoubleTab& tab_hnp1 = le_fluide_->inco_chaleur().valeurs();       //actuel
00072   const DoubleTab& tab_hn = le_fluide_->inco_chaleur().passe();        //passe
00073   const DoubleTab& tab_rho = le_fluide_->masse_volumique().valeurs();    //actuel
00074   const Loi_Etat& loi_ = le_fluide_->loi_etat();
00075 // const DoubleVect& tab_rhon = loi_->rho_n();                       //passe
00076 
00077   int elem, nb_elem=la_zone->nb_elem();
00078   double V = 0; //mesure du domaine
00079   double Fn = 0; //integrale 1 a l'etape n
00080   double Fnp1 = 0; //integrale 1 a l'etape n+1
00081   double S = 0; //second membre
00082 
00083   double dt = le_fluide_->vitesse()->equation().schema_temps().pas_de_temps();
00084   double v,al,bn, bnp1, hn,hnp1, divu;
00085 
00086   int i, face,nb_faces=la_zone->nb_faces();
00087 // calcul T* aux elements
00088   DoubleTab HstarP0(nb_elem);
00089   DoubleTab gradh(nb_faces,dimension);
00090   DoubleTab u_gradh(nb_faces);
00091   int nfe = la_zone->zone().nb_faces_elem();
00092   const IntTab& elem_faces = la_zone->elem_faces();
00093   for (elem=0 ; elem<nb_elem ; elem++)
00094     {
00095       HstarP0(elem) = 0;
00096       for (face=0 ; face<nfe ; face++)
00097         {
00098           hn = tab_hn(elem_faces(elem,face));
00099           hnp1 = tab_hnp1(elem_faces(elem,face));
00100           HstarP0(elem) += .5*(hn+hnp1);
00101         }
00102       HstarP0(elem) /= nfe;
00103     }
00104 // calcul gradT*
00105   calculer_grad(HstarP0,gradh);
00106 // calcul u.gradT*
00107   for (face=0 ; face<nb_faces ; face++)
00108     {
00109       u_gradh(face)=0;
00110       for (i=0 ; i<dimension ; i++)
00111         {
00112           u_gradh(face) += gradh(face,i) * tab_vit(face,i);
00113         }
00114     }
00115 // calcul divU en P0 et P1
00116   DoubleTrav divUP0(nb_elem);
00117   ref_cast(Navier_Stokes_std,le_fluide_->vitesse()->equation()).operateur_divergence().calculer(tab_vit,divUP0);
00118   DoubleTrav divU(nb_faces);
00119   int e0,e1;
00120   for (face=0 ; face<nb_faces ; face++)
00121     {
00122       e0 = la_zone->face_voisins(face,0);
00123       e1 = la_zone->face_voisins(face,1);
00124       if (e0!=-1 && e1!=-1)
00125         {
00126           divU(face) = .5*(divUP0(e0)+divUP0(e1));
00127         }
00128       else if (e0!=-1)
00129         {
00130           divU(face) = divUP0(e0);
00131         }
00132       else
00133         {
00134           divU(face) = divUP0(e1);
00135         }
00136     }
00137 
00138   for (face=0 ; face<nb_faces ; face++)
00139     {
00140       v = la_zone->volumes_entrelaces(face);
00141       V += v;
00142       hn   = tab_hn(face);
00143       hnp1 = tab_hnp1(face);
00144       al = loi_->Drho_DT(Pth_n,hn) / loi_->Drho_DP(Pth_n,hn);
00145       bn = tab_rho(face)/ loi_->Drho_DP(Pth_n,hn);
00146       bnp1 = loi_->calculer_masse_volumique(Pth_n,hnp1) / loi_->Drho_DP(Pth_n,hnp1);
00147       divu = divU(face);
00148 
00149       S -= v *al *((hnp1-hn)/dt + u_gradh(face));
00150       Fn += v * bn * divu;
00151       Fnp1 += v * bnp1 * divu;
00152     }
00153 
00154 
00155   Pth = Pth_n + dt/V *(S-Fn);
00156 // Cerr<<"Volume="<<V<<finl;
00157 // Cerr<<"Fn="<<Fn<<finl;
00158 // Cerr<<"S="<<S<<finl;
00159 // Cerr<<"Pression thermo recalculee (expl) = "<<Pth<<finl;
00160   Pth = Pth_n + dt/V *(S-.5*(Fn+Fnp1));
00161 // Cerr<<"Fnp1="<<Fnp1<<finl;
00162 // Cerr<<"Pression thermo recalculee (impl) = "<<Pth<<finl;
00163   double tmp=0,r;
00164   int k=0;
00165   while (fabs(tmp-Pth)/Pth>1e-9 && k++<20)
00166     {
00167       tmp = Pth;
00168       Fnp1 = 0;
00169       for (face=0 ; face<nb_faces ; face++)
00170         {
00171           v = la_zone->volumes_entrelaces(face);
00172           hnp1 = tab_hnp1(face);
00173           r = loi_->calculer_masse_volumique(Pth,hnp1);
00174           bnp1 = r / loi_->Drho_DP(Pth,hnp1);
00175           Fnp1 += v * bnp1 * divU(face);
00176         }
00177       Pth = Pth_n + dt/V *(S-.5*(Fn+Fnp1));
00178 // Cerr<<"Fnp1="<<Fnp1<<finl;
00179       Cerr<<"Pression thermo recalculee (impl"<<k<<") = "<<Pth<<finl;
00180     }
00181   return Pth;
00182 }
